title: january 14: the opioid crisis
description:
Today on the pod, Maia talks about the day that dying of opioid use became more likely than dying in a car accident, and the measurement of death statistics in the United States today. Then Maia chats about a classic Lana del Rey moment that went down in history. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
